summary: This bill, the SSI Savings Penalty Elimination Act (S. 1234), amends Title XVI of the Social Security Act regarding Supplemental Security Income (SSI). It aims to update the resource limits for SSI eligibility, increasing the limit for individuals to $20,000 in 2025 and for couples to $10,000 in 2025. It also includes provisions for annual inflation adjustments to these limits, ensuring they keep pace with rising costs.
